column4: can someone tell me where to start in getting my sound to work?
just installed hoary on my laptop, no sound
if i try to play something, that application either does nothing or freezes
in the list of devices, i'm not seeing anything that is obviously sound related... though i could be missing somehting
did you update things
you talkting to me?
under /proc/asound/cards: it has  Intel 82801DB-ICH4 with unknown codec at 0xe0100c00, irq 17
try pon in terminal
when I tried pon I got a "only members of the 'dip' group can use this comand"
then its not setup right
well, I guess it's not setup right....what are my other options?
i told you pon
try sudo pon
then you have wrong type modem
need to knwo if its a hardware modem or winmodem
I'm pretty sure it's not a winmodem
is it a external or internal modem
make and model
it's a PCTel INc
go here http://pctelcompdb.sourceforge.net/
thank you
get an external serial modem
i meant
the best there is diamond supra express
